:::::{#about}

Bethany Hamilton Bhat completed her PhD in the Quantitative Methods program at The University of Texas at Austin. 
Her dissertation work examined the power of cluster-robust hypothesis tests in meta-regression models for dependent effect sizes. 
She is now a post-doctoral scholar at the University of Maastricht in the Netherlands, where she works with Wolfgang Viechtbauer.
Her research interests include meta-analysis, hierarchical linear modeling, and Bayesian inference.
